turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order four pizzas from Bella Luna Pizzeria, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size would you like those pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The first one I would like Hawaiian, and make that hand-tossed. The second one I would like chicken Alfredo, and make that a deep-dish. The third, mushrooms and pepperonis also deep-dish. And then the fourth one supreme pizza hand-tossed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium pizzas, 1 hawaiin hand tossed, 1 supreme hand tossed, 1 chicken alfredo deep dish, and one mushroom and pepperoni deep dish, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will come pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 45 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'll be all. Thank you very much.
